price: Namni erga miidhamee booda haaloo bahate, isaan sun diliin isaan irra hin jiru.
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
